message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $80. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. I am offering it to you for $95 today. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this item at a premium value. Let me know if you're interested!

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher than that. Can you meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and I'm willing to negotiate. In light of that, I propose we meet halfway between my initial offer and your counteroffer. Therefore, I am proposing a price of $82 for the product. I hope this aligns better with both our expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm getting closer to a price I'm comfortable with. How about $78? I'm willing to pay that, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Can you meet me at this price?
